mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PROD_NO
SELECT * FROM product WHERE totalsales = (SELECT max(totalsales) FROM product)

SELECT * FROM product WHERE totalsales IN (SELECT totalsales FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, totalsales FROM (SELECT totalsales FROM product ORDER BY totalsales desc)) WHERE rnum>=1 AND rnum<=5) ORDER BY totalsales desc
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PROD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
